description:
FIND OUT WHY THE WORLD IS SLEEPING BETTER! White Noise Lite provides ambient sounds of the environment to help you relax or sleep. Are you in a hotel and miss the familiar sound of your fan or air conditioner? Flying on a plane and just want to nap? Includes high quality looping noises such as waves crashing on a beach, crickets chirping at night, and the soothing sound of rain fall.

Relax. Sleep better. Feel better.

FEATURES
- Easy to use interface quickly lets you select your favorite sound
- Play/Pause and Next/Previous controls
- Current sound is saved between launches
- Screen fade to black after 10 seconds (Note: Locking screen will stops the audio in PDK apps)
- Screen swipe left or right also changes sound
- Includes beautiful images that match the high quality of each sound
INCLUDES AMBIENT SOUNDS WITH PHOTOS: 
Airplane, Beach Waves, Chimes, Crickets Chirping, Extreme Rain, Oscillating Fan, Thunder Storm, and White Noise.

Fan us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/tmsoft

Follow us on Twitter at http://twitter.com/tmsoft

Visit our website at http://www.tmsoft.com/

Upgrade to the full version of White Noise to get more sounds and features!  Please click the application info button for more information.
